<Text: St. George, Staten Island:  It is the most densely developed neighborhood on Staten Island, and the location of the administrative center for the borough and for the coterminous Richmond County.>

<Text: St. George, Staten Island:  The Staten Island terminal of the Staten Island Ferry is located here, as well as the northern terminus of the Staten Island Railway.>

Text: St. George, Staten Island:  St. George is bordered on the south by the neighborhood of Tompkinsville and on the west by the neighborhood of New Brighton.
